attributes.action: All parties should agree to annual televised debates to assess performance.
attributes.additional_details:
This is in conjunction with Jeremy Corbyn's recent proposals, to which David Cameron should respond.
http://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/politics/jeremy-corbyn-challenges-david-cameron-to-annual-tv-debate-a6788926.html
attributes.background:
The undersigned, believe that there should be annual televised debates between party leaders to assess the government's performance throughout the year. 
A fairly selected audience should be present and permitted to ask questions of all leaders.
Such proceedings would make MPs more accountable.

rejection.details: This is a decision for the broadcasters and the political parties, not for the Government and Parliament.
